table.caption: Amethyst Dragon Quests
rows: "Destroy a cell of the Cult of the Dragon, and bring me the cult leader's head."
"Find a lance that befits my majesty."
"Travel to another world. Return to me only once you have something worth showing."
"A psychic disturbance pains me. Locate the monster causing this, and slay it."
"I yearn to see an aerie atop a mountain of unparalleled beauty. Take this amethyst to such a place."
"I sense the presence of a wayward flumph somewhere on this world. Help this flumph find its cloister."
table.name: Amethyst Dragon Quests
